CustomField.description: Use in the On Site conversion Flow, less SOQL calls to have this info sat on a WO object than to retrieve it directly from the C&C object. + Total of Product Required of type 'Van Stock' on the related Work Order
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total of Product Required of type 'Van Stock' on the related Work Order
CustomField.label: C&C Charge: Total Van Stock Product Req
